data.title: Reliant Medical Group, Central and Metrowest MA
data.meta_description: At Reliant Medical Group, you’ll find a pediatric team of pediatricians and other professionals who will help you with all the issues affecting your child in Auburn, Framingham, Holden, Leominster, Milford, Southboro, Westborough, and Worcester.
data.text:
View all of our pediatricians welcoming new patients here.

We know nothing in life is more important to you than your children’s health and wellbeing. At Reliant Medical Group, you’ll find a team of dedicated providers who will help with all the medical, developmental, behavioral and social issues affecting your child.

Starting right after your child is born, we’ll help you with health screenings, immunizations, and treatment for virtually any type of illness or injury, from routine to complex. Our doctors will use their knowledge and experience to answer any question you might have about your child’s health and development.

Care that’s available day or night

Parenting is one of the biggest commitments you can make in life. That’s why we work hard to make sure our care is designed around your needs. Some of our locations have extended hours on evenings and weekends (by appointment only), including Auburn, Leominster, Shrewsbury, Southborough, Westborough, and Worcester.

Our walk-in care service, ReadyMED, also offers evening and weekend hours.

Virtual ReadyMED can see patients age 4+ via video visits from 7am-11pm/7 days a week. This service is provided via our online patient portal, MyChart.

Plus you can speak to our on-call pediatric nurses and physicians for medical advice. At Reliant Medical Group, we make it easy to give your children the care they need.

Services provided include:
